title: New health bars
body: So I actually don't mind the new health bars. I like the look of them. I just want to know what happened to the bounty gold next to your health? I didnt see anything about it on patch notes. Why is it gone, and could we bring it back?

replies.body: I've been scouring those patch notes myself, but it doesn't seem like anything should have changed with those bounty tracking icons. I'm gonna ask around and see what I can find out!

they HURT MY EYES
NOTHING HELPS
